verbs.description: [ARG0: husbands] [R-ARG0: who] [V: extinguish] [ARG1: their wives libidos] modern wives often lose the sensuality of womanhood they are feminine when they marry but are quickly relegated to the roles of caretaker wage - earner housekeeper and waitress burdened with res shmuley boteach grand canyon
